description.@en: I fear nothing—I’ve looked devils in the face and spat in their eyes, laughing all the while.

data.notes: Every Profession possesses a unique knack, an ability that no other Profession has access to. The Trait immediately follows the Profession’s description.

effect.@en: After you make an Attack Action, immediately make a Counterattack with any one-handed ranged weapon on the same Turn.
